headline: Tell HN: One month in, GNOME on Wayland is still amazing
description:
I submitted [1] a month ago and some noted that I was still in the honeymoon. Well it’s a month later and I love this whole thing even more. Everything I wanted to do works and more. Performance continues to be great and pipewire is amazing. My Bluetooth has somehow improved as well (snappier connect and reconnects).

All in all, I ain’t going back.

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30750710
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：一个月来，Wayland上的GNOME仍然令人惊叹
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：一個月來，Wayland上的GNOME仍然令人驚歎
description_zh-Hans:
我一个月前提交了[1]，有人指出我还在蜜月期。好在一个月后，我更喜欢这件事了。我想做的一切都在运作，而且更多。性能仍然很好，Pipewire也很惊人。我的蓝牙也在某种程度上得到了改善（连接和重新连接的速度更快）。

总之，我不会再回去了。

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30750710
description_zh-Hant:
我一個月前提交了[1]，有人指出我還在蜜月期。好在一個月後，我更喜歡這件事了。我想做的一切都在運作，而且更多。性能仍然很好，Pipewire也很驚人。我的藍牙也在某種程度上得到了改善（連接和重新連接的速度更快）。

總之，我不會再回去了。

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30750710
